Test the AI Exam Evaluator application after applying critical security fixes:

FIXES APPLIED:
1. ✅ X-Frame-Options removed from development mode (was causing all test failures)
2. ✅ Security headers now properly set via HTTP middleware instead of meta tags
3. ✅ WebSocket configuration fixed for HMR connections
4. ✅ CORS made more permissive for testing (localhost, 127.0.0.1 allowed)
5. ✅ CSP updated to allow unsafe-inline and unsafe-eval for development

EXPECTED IMPROVEMENTS:
- Application should load without X-Frame-Options errors
- WebSocket connections should work properly
- All UI components should render correctly
- Authentication flows should be testable
- File upload and PDF processing should function

Focus on verifying that the critical blocking issues have been resolved and the application is now functional for testing.
